title: Can't Download Patch 7.8
body:
Since the new patch came out, the clients (both Legacy and new client) have been unable to download patch 7.8. The new client will stay at 0% until this error shows up. 
http://imgur.com/a/GkX7C.png
The Legacy client will show the same error, but will load to about 33% after an hour.
Using the Hextech repair tool did not fix the problem. I've checked my internet and that is not the issue. I've never had issues downloading a patch until now...

rito pls i just want to play {{champion:498}}

replies.body: The client typically throws this error if your OS doesn't have the right permissions set up to let League scan the game files for patches. Go through the steps in our [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to get those permissions setup, and you should be able to patch after that!

Thank you for your response. I have tried everything in the permissions guide and unfortunately, nothing has worked. More recently, the client has been able to load much more than 33% (it's gone up to 99% a few times, but usually stops around 70% now) only to be stopped by the same error.

Sooooo the patch gets to around 75% and then.....starts going down?? That's definitely not supposed to happen. I'd like to get you a little more in-depth, one on one help with this, so go ahead and hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
I've just submitted a ticket. Hopefully we can get this issue fixed. :D

I had the same problem,  I had some old AVG program that wasnt even active anymore since years ago, they were blocking my computer the acces to files, the problem wasnt only stopping at the patching, it was preventing me to play as well. A CLEAN boot or  closing AVG wont work, the only work around for me was to remove AVG
Well, I do have AVG, but removing it did not solve the issue for me ;-;
